src_text: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.
ref_text: Siminoff yavuze ko ibyagurishijwebyiyongereye nyuma y’uko mu mwaka wa 2013 agaragaye mu gice cya Shark Tank aho itsinda ryerekanaga ryangaga gutera inkunga iyo sosiyete nshya.

src_text: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.
ref_text: Ku mugoroba w’ejo, umuseneteri uriho akaba Madamu wa Perezida wa Arijantine, Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner yatangaje kandidatire ye ya perezida i La Plata, umujyi uri ku birometero 50 (mayilo 31) uvuye i Buenos Aires.
hyp_text: Seneta y'ubuhinzi na Nyina wa Perezida wa Arjantini, Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner, yavuze ko yari yavuze kandi yaba Perezida yikurikira mu kwezi k'ubwo, mu mugezi wa La Plata, mu mujyi uheruka 50 kileo (31 milimito) ku mugezi wa Buenos Aires.

src_text: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.
ref_text: Stephen Harper, minisitiri w’intebe yemeye kohereza amategeko ya guverinoma ‘agenga kubungabunga ikirere’ kuri komite z’amashyaka yose kugira ngo ayasome, mbere y’isomwa ryayo rya kabiri, nyuma y’iminota 25 yo ku wa kabiri n’umuyobozi wa NDP, Jack Layton kuri PMO.
hyp_text: Perezida w'Umuryango Stephen Harper yahaye gukora gukora 'Ibikorwa by'Imihindagurikire Ibihembo' mu kurya ku kiganiro cy'abandi bakuru, kugera kuri kabiri kugeza ku kwezi wa Lutati, mu gihe cy'isumbuye y'ibihe 25 by'ukwezi wa Lutati ku giti cya Perezida w'Umuryango na Perezida w'NDP Jack Layton mu kigo cya PMO.

src_text: He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said "[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."
ref_text: Hatangajwe ko yari afite imyaka 20. Mu ijambo rye, Bieber yaravuze ati: "Mu gihe ntari mpari cyangwa ngo ngire mpite ngira icyo nkora kuri iyi nkuru ibabaje y’impanuka, ibitekerezo byanjye n'amasengesho yanjye mbyerekeje ku muryango w'uwahohotewe."

src_text: Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
ref_text: Abashakashatsi bo muri Kaminuza ya Princeton yo muri Leta zunze ubumwe za Amerika na Kaminuza ya Uppsala muri Suwede bavuze ko ubwoko bushya bwabayeho mu bisekuru bibiri gusa, nubwo bikekwa ko iki gikorwa cyatwaye igihe kisumbuyeho, bitewe no kwivanga k’ubwoko hagati y’inyoni za Darwin finch ziba mu gace kamwe, Geospiza fortes, na cactus finch zajee ziturutse ahandi, Geospiza conirostris.
hyp_text: Abashyitsi mu karere ka Princeton mu Gihugu cya Amerika ndetse no mu karere ka Uppsala mu Sweden yashyize ku ishyirahamwe ry'inyenyeri y'ikimenyetso, ahubwo ishyirahamwe ry'ihumana ryari ryafashwe kugira ngo ryikurikirane, kubera gukora ibintu bya Geospiza fortes, Geospiza conirostris.
